name: io.github.mirza-glitch/markitdown-js
description: MarkItDown JS - Converts various file formats (PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, images, audio, HTML) to Markdown format. JavaScript/NPM port inspired by Microsoft's MarkItDown.

name: io.github.dead8309/markitdown-ts
description: MarkItDown TypeScript - Modern TypeScript implementation for converting documents (PDF, Word, Excel, images, audio) to Markdown with AI-powered image descriptions.

name: io.github.modelcontextprotocol/github
description: GitHub MCP server - Interact with GitHub repositories, issues, pull requests, and more through the GitHub API.

name: io.github.syedmajidraza/mcp-postgres
description: PostgreSQL MCP Server - Query and manage PostgreSQL databases with tools for listing tables, describing schemas, and executing SQL queries. Note: This server uses HTTP/FastAPI (not stdio). Use the automated installer script for easy setup.

tools.name: list_tables
tools.description: List all tables in the PostgreSQL database

tools.name: describe_table
tools.description: Get detailed schema information for a specific table

tools.name: query_database
tools.description: Execute SELECT queries on the PostgreSQL database

tools.name: execute_sql
tools.description: Execute INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE, and CREATE statements
